New Records: Bolivia secured a 1-0 victory over Colombia in their FIFA World Cup qualifier, marking their fourth win in the tournament and improving their standings
Key Match Events: Miguel Terceros scored the winning goal for Bolivia in the 58th minute with a left-footed thunderbolt
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held in El Alto, Bolivia, at over 4,000 meters above sea level, which has been beneficial for Bolivia's performance in home qualifiers
Others: Bolivia last qualified for the World Cup in 1994 and is aiming to secure automatic qualification for the 2026 finals
